info.+content: Kidō Senshi Gundam Double O Second Season
機動戦士ガンダム00 <ダブルオー> セカンドシーズン
機動戰士鋼彈00 SECOND SEASON

2312 A.D. Four years have passed since the final battle between Celestial Being and the UN Forces. Humanity, after having established the Earth Sphere Federation, forms an independent security force, A-LAWS, separate from the formal Federation army to further unify nations and the will of mankind. But in reality it is simply inhumane oppressing anti-government powers, doctrines, and ideologies in the name of unity. Setsuna F. Seiei, after surviving the battle four years ago, has decided to once again fight with his Gundam.
#1: "Hakanaku mo Towa no Kanashi" (儚くも永久のカナシ; Fleeting and Everlasting Sorrow) by UVERworld (eps 2-13)
#2: "Namida no Mukou (泪のムコウ; Across from the Tears)" by Stereopony (eps 14-25)
#1: "Hakanaku mo Towa no Kanashi (儚くも永久のカナシ; Fleeting and Everlasting Sorrow)" by UVERworld (ep 1)
